t: Haitian Metal Art - Gifts With Humanity
s: Haitian Metal art is hand crafted by artisans in Haiti using up-cycled 50 gallon steel oil drums. Artisans use rudimentary tools to etch detailed wall art, vessels, bowls, and holiday ornaments. Purchases support disadvantaged groups and help them to earn an income.
